duties_responsibilities.duty: Translate customer requirements into programmatic design and control system installation specifications.
Prepare and test PLC hardware for projects.
Understand and apply electrical design drawings and specifications for machine control programming.
Collaborate with the PC software developers and electrical engineering team.
Participate in in-house testing and on-site commissioning of the machine control system.
Assist in programming and debugging of PLC and HMI systems.
Oversee additional tasks and projects as assigned.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Engineering (Electrical, Mechanical, or Computer) or related field from an accredited university.
